Fatal.origin: [a defect in the proceedings "W. R. LaFave and J. H. Israel"]

1.definition: causing failure of a legal claim or cause of action [a defect in the proceedings "W. R. LaFave and J. H. Israel"]

2.definition: making something (as a contract) invalid or unenforceable [there is a indefiniteness with the result that the agreement is void "J. D. Calamari and J. M. Perillo"]
